items.sentence: I thought putting the key under the mat was a good idea, but it wasn't.
I tore the paper from the gatepost and put it in my pocket with a sigh.
Tom and Mary spent hours walking around town and talking to each other.
Mary took her time choosing a dress even though Tom was waiting for her.
Mary is 21 years younger than Tom, but Tom is 22 times richer than Mary.
